reviews.review_msg: Lydia is NOT A HEALTH SCIENCE PROFESSOR!!!! She is a PHILOSOPHY Prof and it really showed. This class was not made to be relevant to health science majors. Readings (mandatory for assignment completion) are HEAVY. Long and complex. Like read 3 times to understand complex. No midterm and final though..!

Lydia means well and is a very nice and understanding prof, but her lectures were brutal. After week 4, 5-10 students attended lecture which made it difficult to attend + sit in the quiet room. The lecture, tutorial and assignments were all pretty irrelevant to each other, they felt like 3 different courses. The TA (Ravi) made this class bearable.
